phrs.translation: 异常处理，异常情况处理；例外处理

sentences.sentence: There is one exception to this general principle.
sentences.translation: 这个一般性原则有一例外。

sentences.sentence: No one could possibly take exception to his comments.
sentences.translation: 任何人都不可能对他的意见提出异议。

sentences.sentence: Nobody had much money at the time and I was no exception.
sentences.translation: 那时候谁都没有很多钱，我也不例外。
